DOC.brief_summary: Investigate the acute effect of ribose supplementation on performance and recovery in athletes.
DOC.criteria: Men and women Training volume > 7hrs/week VO2 max > 40 and 45 mg/kg/min (for women and men respectively) Otherwise healthy individuals Pregnant or breastfeeding women Individuals with endocrine disorders, hypercholesterolemia, cardiovascular diseases, gut diseases, cancer, anemia, hypoglycemia Medication for lipids, diabetes, hypertension, inflammation, autoimmune diseases, mood disorders Excessive alcohol consumption (more than two drinks by day for men, one for women), smoking, drug use, supplements or natural products consumption during the study
